price_and_delivery_infoThree: Three pieces for 599 EGP + free shipping
silk_description: Made from premium 100% pure silk for ultimate comfort and skin benefits
sleep_benefits: Helps you fall asleep faster and enjoy deeper, more restful sleep
eye_benefit: Prevents eye puffiness and reduces dark circles with gentle silk pressure
anti_aging_benefit: Anti-aging properties help prevent sleep wrinkles and fine lines
special_description: What Makes Our Deep Sleep Mask Special
silver_ion_technology_info: This silk sleep mask is treated with SilvadurÂ® silver ion technology, a natural process that incorporates silver ions into fabrics for their antimicrobial properties. This effectively removes bacteria and provides a protective barrier against germs, reducing the risk of infections or skin irritations.
dermatologists_love: Dermatologists Love Our Deep Sleep Mask
packaging_description: Every Dore & Rose product comes in a beautiful custom-made packaging designed to make your unboxing experience feel luxurious, whether it's for you or someone special.
improve_sleep_quality_question: How can the Deep Sleep Mask improve my sleep quality?
improve_sleep_quality_info: Our Deep Sleep Mask blocks out light effectively, creating a dark environment that promotes deep, uninterrupted sleep. The comfortable fit stays in place throughout the night, while the soft breathable silk fabric allows for proper airflow, giving an extremely relaxing feeling to your eyes. Falling asleep was never this easy.
promote_better_skin_question: How does the Deep Sleep Mask promote better skin?
promote_better_skin_info: Our Deep Sleep Mask is made of the highest quality silk. The surface reduces friction, preventing sleep lines and wrinkles. It helps retain moisture, promoting a youthful complexion. The hypoallergenic silk is gentle on the skin, reducing irritation and inflammation. Experience anti-aging benefits with our Deep Sleep Mask.
suitable_for_all_skin_types_question: Is it suitable for every skin type?
suitable_for_all_skin_types_response: Yes! Unlike other skin care products, our Deep Sleep Mask is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
product_testing_info: Absolutely! Our products are SGS certified, the largest testing organization worldwide. Tests show that the silver ions remain effective even after 51 washes!
cotton_vs_silk_question: What is the biggest difference between cotton and silk?
cotton_vs_silk_info: Most people sleep on cotton pillowcases, but did you know after just 3 days, there are as many bacteria on your pillowcase as on a toilet seat? Our silk masks are infused with silver ions, eliminating 99.7% of bacteria. Silk is also naturally soft, cooling, and hypoallergenic.
customer_panel_info: Based on independent customer panel over four weeks
sleep_mask_info: Experience the ultimate sleep upgrade with our Deep Sleep Mask. It provides 100% light blockage for perfect darkness and a gentle, soft touch on your eyes. Drift off easily and enjoy improved sleep quality, including enhanced REM sleep cycles.
ThankYouMessage: Thank you for your purchase. We have received your order and will process it soon.
ShippingConfirmation: You will receive shipping confirmation via email soon
RefundPolicyDescription: At Smarketing LLC, we take pride in the quality of our products and our commitment to customer satisfaction. If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, we would like to clarify that we do not process refunds or accept returns. However, we are happy to offer an easy replacement option, provided that Limited Warranty was included in your order.
ExtendedWarrantyDescription: For those who opted for extended warranty and experience any issues with their order, such as receiving damaged or defective products, we ask that you contact our customer support team within 14 days of delivery.
ReplacementProductDescription: In such circumstances, we will promptly arrange to send you a replacement product at no additional cost.
SmoothProcessDescription: To ensure a smooth and efficient replacement process, please contact our customer support at info@smarketing.llc. Our team is dedicated to assisting you and ensuring an exceptional shopping experience with us.
AppreciationMessage: We appreciate your choice to shop with Smarketing LLC and look forward to serving you again.
ThankYouMessageShippingPolicy: Thank you for choosing Smarketing LLC. Our goal is to provide you with an exceptional shopping experience. We encourage you to review our shipping policy to understand the delivery process for your order.
ProcessingTimeDescription: Please allow 2-3 business days for your order to be processed and packaged. Our team ensures each product is inspected and carefully packaged before leaving our warehouse.
ShippingTimeDescription: After your order is processed, delivery is estimated to take 6-12 business days, although this may vary depending on your location and unforeseen external factors.
TrackingYourOrderDescription: To keep you informed of your order's progress, we will provide you with a tracking number as soon as it becomes available. You can use this number to track your shipment and receive real-time updates on its status.
ShippingMethodsDescription: We partner with reliable shipping companies to ensure your products are delivered safely and on time.
ShippingDelaysDescription: We strive to deliver your order on time, but please be aware that external circumstances such as weather conditions may occasionally cause slight delays. We will keep you informed and actively work to address any significant delays.
AddressAccuracyDescription: To avoid any delivery problems, please ensure your shipping address is correct and complete. We cannot be held responsible for orders shipped to incorrect or incomplete addresses provided by customers.
MissingOrDamagedPackagesDescription: In the event of a package being lost or arriving damaged, please contact our customer support team immediately. If there was an error in shipping or delivery, we will work quickly to correct the situation and provide a satisfactory solution. Your satisfaction is our priority at Smarketing LLC. For any inquiries or additional assistance, our customer support team is available at info@smarketing.llc to assist you.
HappyShoppingMessage: Happy shopping and thank you for being a valued customer!
TermsOfServiceIntro: Welcome to Smarketing LLC. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and the products we offer. By accessing our website or making a purchase, you agree to be bound by these terms.
ProductUseDescription: Our products are intended for personal use only. Any commercial use without prior written consent is prohibited.
OrderAcceptanceDescription: All orders are subject to acceptance by us. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including limitations on quantities available for purchase.
PricesAndPaymentDescription: All prices are listed in the local currency and are subject to change without notice. Payment is due at the time of delivery (Cash on Delivery).
IntellectualPropertyDescription: All content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, and images, is the property of Smarketing LLC and is protected by copyright laws.
LimitationOfLiabilityDescription: Smarketing LLC shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our products or website.
GoverningLawDescription: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Smarketing LLC operates.
ChangesToTermsDescription: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of our website following any changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.
ContactInformationTerms: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at info@smarketing.llc.
PrivacyPolicyIntro: At Smarketing LLC, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or make a purchase.
InformationCollectedDescription: We collect personal information that you provide directly to us, such as your name, address, email, phone number, and payment information when you place an order.
UseOfInformationDescription: We use your information to process and fulfill your orders, communicate with you about your order, and provide customer support. We may also use your information to improve our website and services.
InformationSharingDescription: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business.
CookiesDescription: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze website traffic, and understand where our visitors are coming from.
DataSecurityDescription: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
YourRightsDescription: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to the processing of your personal information or request a restriction of processing.
ChangesToPrivacyPolicyDescription: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
ContactInformationPrivacy: If you have any questions about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at info@smarketing.llc.
Operated By: This website is operated by Smarketing LLC.
Engagement: By visiting our site and/or purchasing something from us, you engage in our service and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions.
Reading Terms: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website.
New Features: As we add new features and functionality to our site, these terms may need to be updated.

Privacy_Policy_P1: This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or make a purchase from our website.
Privacy_Policy_P2: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website.
Privacy_Policy_Changes_P1: We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.
COLLECTION_P1: When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device.
COLLECTION_P2: Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site.
COLLECTION_P3: When you make a purchase or attempt to make a purchase through the Site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, billing address, shipping address, payment information, email address, and phone number.
Info_Collection_Intro: We collect information in the following ways:
Contact_Details: Contact details including name, email, phone number, and address when you place an order
Customer_Support_Information: Customer support inquiries and communication history
Info_Collection_Features_Note: These details help us provide you with a personalized and efficient shopping experience.
Cookies_Collection_Description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track the activity on our Service and hold certain information. Cookies are files with small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier.
Third_Party_Info_Intro: We may use various third-party services to assist us with our operations:
Support_Companies: Service providers who help operate our business
Interaction_Tracking: Analytics services to improve our website
Third_Party_Info_Compliance: All third parties we work with adhere to strict data protection standards.
Use_Personal_Info_Title: HOW WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
Use_Personal_Info_P1: To process your orders and deliver products
Use_Personal_Info_P2: To communicate with you about your purchase
Use_Personal_Info_P3: To improve our services and website functionality
Disclosure_Intro: We may share your information in these limited circumstances:
Vendors_Services: With vendors who provide services on our behalf
Business_Marketing_Partners: With marketing partners for relevant promotions
User_Consent: When you have given your consent
Affiliates_Corporate_Group: Within our corporate family of companies
Business_Transactions: For business transfers, mergers, or reorganizations
User_Generated_Content_P1: Any content you submit, such as product reviews or feedback, may be made publicly available on our site.
User_Generated_Content_P2: Please ensure such content does not contain sensitive personal information you do not wish to be public.
Third_Party_Websites_Links_P1: Our Service may contain links to other sites not operated by us. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.
Security_Retention_P1: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.
Security_Retention_P2: We retain your information only as long as necessary to provide you with our services or as required by law.
Rights_And_Choices_Intro: Depending on your location, you may have these rights regarding your data:
Right_To_Access_Know: Right to access and know what information we collect about you
Right_To_Delete: Right to delete your personal information
Right_To_Opt_Out_Of_Sale_Or_Sharing: Right to opt-out of sale or sharing of your information
Restriction_Of_Processing: Right to restrict how we process your data
Withdrawal_Of_Consent: Right to withdraw consent at any time
Appeal_Process: Right to appeal our decision regarding your request
Managing_Comm_Preferences: Right to manage your communication preferences
Exercise_Rights_Information: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us through our contact information provided below.
Non_Discrimination_Statement: We will not discriminate against you for exercising any of your privacy rights.
Designation_Of_Agent: You may designate an authorized agent to make a request on your behalf.
Timely_Response_Assurance: We will respond to your request in a timely manner as required by applicable law.
Complaints_Content: If you believe we have processed your information in a way that does not comply with this Privacy Policy or applicable law, you can file a complaint with us directly or with your local data protection authority.
International_Users_Content: If you are located outside of the jurisdiction in which we operate, please be aware that any information you provide to us will be transferred to and processed in that jurisdiction. By using our Service, you consent to this transfer.
Contact_Content: For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at info@smarketing.llc or by mail using the details provided on our website.
